title: Game Crashes when playing Katarina
body: Everytime i pick katarina my game crashes, then runs in the background so my team can't remake. It's starting to get really REALLY annoying since katarina is one of my mains.

replies.body: If this is only happening with Katarina then there may specific game data that's failing to render the game, assuming it's resulting in bugsplats.  Go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
